biotools.summary: BreastImplantAnalyzer is an easy-to-use, validated tool for calculating breast implant volume from MRI data. BreastImplantAnalyzer was designed to be as easy-to-use as possible for plastic surgeons. Using a simple interface, a patient's MRI can be loaded into the application and a semi-automated algorithm will determine the volume of the implant.
